@Phantom_generator_2D/phantom_rod_list.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 % ======================================================================
00002 %> @brief % phantom_rod_list generates list of structures for ellipse objects
00003 %> structure: 
00004 %> center of ellipse, axes, ellipse rotation, permittivity value, polar
00005 %> coordinates of ellipse
00006 %>
00007 %> @param imsize diameter of field of view  
00008 %> @param beta object rotation (use to fit numeric to real object)[mm]
00009 %> @param d circle [mm]
00010 %> @param D node [mm]
00011 %> @param eps_value permittivity value for all rods
00012 %>
00013 %> @retval el list of structures for rod parameters
00014 % =====================================================================
00015 function [el] = phantom_rod_list(phobj,imsize,d,D, beta, eps_value)
00016 
00017 global data_type
00018 
00019 x_o=0;
00020 y_o=0;
00021 
00022 [x y w h a r] = phobj.hexgrid(x_o,y_o,imsize,imsize,d,D,beta,0);
00023 if strcmp(phobj.phantom_name,'ask_me')
00024 figure;
00025 phobj.hexplot(x_o,y_o,imsize,imsize,d,D,beta,'index',1);
00026 
00027 i=1;
00028 work=1;
00029 %indx=[];
00030 while work
00031 %     str='Select rod from picture. e-exit or write one number : ';   
00032 %     num=input(str,'s'); % read to string    
00033 
00034     prompt = {'Select rod from picture.Type ''''e'''' to exit or type one number : '};
00035     dlg_title = 'Input for phantom';
00036     num_lines = 1;
00037     def = {'1','hsv'};
00038     num = inputdlg(prompt,dlg_title,num_lines,def);
00039     
00040     if (strcmp(num,'e'))
00041         work=0;        
00042     elseif str2double(num)>length(x)
00043         errordlg('Number is too big','error')
00044         error('Number is too big');
00045     else    
00046             num=round(str2double(num));
00047             indx(i)=num;
00048             i=i+1;            
00049     end
00050 end
00051 elseif strcmp(phobj.phantom_name,'rods_indx')
00052     indx=phobj.indx;
00053 end
00054 
00055 
00056 V = eps_value*ones(1,length(indx));
00057                 
00058 if isempty(indx)
00059       error('Phantom object is empty ');
00060 end
00061 
00062 for k=1:length(indx)
00063     i = indx(k);
00064     X(k) = x(i); 
00065     Y(k) = y(i);
00066     W(k) = w(i); 
00067     H(k) = h(i);
00068     A(k) = a(i); 
00069     R(k) = r(i);
00070 end
00071 
00072 for i=1:length(indx)
00073     r = R(i);
00074     alpha = A(i);
00075     a = W(i)/2;
00076     b = H(i)/2;
00077     v = V(i);
00078     el(i,1)=-r*sin(alpha);
00079     el(i,2)=r*cos(alpha);
00080     el(i,3)=a;
00081     el(i,4)=b;
00082     el(i,5)=0;
00083     el(i,6)=v;
00084 end
